entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Dryden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:47 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dryden Airport 11:50 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -4.0°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: WNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:14 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
